_header: In the name of the blessed Trinity
_description: A prayer on rising — one stanza rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
In the name of þe blessid trinyteThe fader þe sone and
                    þe holi goost…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…Thorgh vertu and grace of þis [cross] holy syneWhere on
                    þow suffred þi passyon pyne
BodRawB408.Editions:
Clark,  Andrew,
                        ed.  
             The English Register of Godstow Nunnery… c. 1450.
             3 vols. 
             EETS
         o. s. 129 (1905; repr. 1971); 130 (1906; repr. with 142, 1971); 142
